document_data.name: Hatar
document_data.mainbody: '''Hatar''' was a [[Sorcerer (kit)|sorcerer]] who served in the court of [[Tajar]] in the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[west Zakhara]] in {{Yearlink|1367}}.{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Hatar discovered that [[Riqqiyah]] was actually Sultan [[Kori al-Zafiri]], Tajar's previous ruler. He intended to use this information to his advantage.
document_data.History: Hatar was originally from [[I'tiraf]] across the [[Golden Gulf]].
document_data.Relationships: He was served by a loyal [[dao]] who would perform any command given by Hatar.
